entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the morning. Local blowing snow in outlying areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow in outlying areas early in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
